content: Hi, the syllabus mentions the HKN tutoring service but I can only seem to find a super old website for them. Do they still exist? If so, where can I find them?
subject: HKN tutoring service?

content:
Earlier this semester they were defunct but now are advertising hiring for tutors again! When I try the website I am able to open up a portal to schedule a tutoring session.

https://hkn.mit.edu/

If this does not work, office hours are a great time to come and get help on material from an LA or TA (unless you're near a pset or checkoff deadline). Plus they are all day at your convenience!
